FROM golang:1.11

ENV BUILD_DIR /app

RUN mkdir -p $BUILD_DIR
WORKDIR $BUILD_DIR

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends ruby-dev -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN gem install fpm --no-ri --no-rdoc

COPY . $BUILD_DIR/
RUN go get
